name: The Void Beast
description:
Theme: You Are The Monster

Original Descriptions:

You are a void beast, consuming humans to gain power. You despise life, humans in particular. No one knows what you are, no one knows what you want. You do not seem to care and have probably forgotten about it long ago. 

The village knows you are here, you have killed so many. Now they’re trying to run. Being the cold hearted monster, you intercept them and make sure you harvest their very flesh for your own benefits. 

Kill KILL KILL! 

Play as a monster with 4 abilities to kill people. You are weak to light so avoid their lamps. Upgrade your abilities as you consume more people. 

Replayable! 

4 different difficulties, 1 unlocked after beating hard mode! 

Try out different builds as you play! 

Fight through a maze of unsuspecting humans as you pick them off one by one.
